text:
If you upgrade to the latest version the install goes fine after removing the 
previous release but upon looking at the services installed you see there were 
none installed.
I found my problem by trying to run the Apache suggestion of:
bin\Apache -k install
This told me that the jrun module was not the correct one for this version of 
Apache.
I didn't find any resolution yet to run Cold Fusion MX with the latest version 
so I had to resort back to the previous release.
creator: stevew@uis.net

text:
The bug that no service is created when the config is invalid has been
  reported before [and remains open].

  Modules must be upgraded, there is no binary compatibility between
  2.0.36 and 2.0.39, please contact your vendor for an updated binary 
  release of their module.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
